code: @Override public RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(RestRequest restRequest, NodeClient client) throws IOException {     DeletePipelineRequest request = new DeletePipelineRequest(restRequest.param("id")).     request.masterNodeTimeout(restRequest.paramAsTime("master_timeout", request.masterNodeTimeout())).     request.timeout(restRequest.paramAsTime("timeout", request.timeout())).     return channel -> client.admin().cluster().deletePipeline(request, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
